etymology.description: 丣 (liǔ) is an ancient form of 酉 (yǒu, "wine vessel") -> original representation of 酒 (jiǔ, "alcohol") -> used in compounds related to fermentation
etymology.interpretation: The character 丣 (liǔ) represents an ancient form of 酉 (yǒu, "wine vessel"), which was used in reference to alcohol and fermentation processes. It highlights the character's origin in depicting a wine vessel before the concept evolved into 酉.
